exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : nat, n + m = 1 -> n = 1 /\\ m = 0 \\/ n = 0 /\\ m = 1" on hypothesis of type "BinInt.Z.of_nat (iter nxtprime 2 n) = BinInt.Z.of_nat (iter nxtprime 2 m)".

original: intros H. apply Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff in H. unfold nthprime in H. apply Nat.eq_add_1 in H.
